headline.main: The Cuban Programme-Condition of the Finances--The Kansas Question--Speeches in Congress, &c.

docs.snippet: Yesterday the office of the Recorder was filled to overflowing with the principal fighting-men of the City, to hear the preliminary examination of CYRUS SHMAY, JOHN N. BRIGGS, SAMUEL E. BRIGGS and ANDREW HINES, on a charge, made through the affidavit...

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; The Fighting-Men Before the Recorder The Assault on MacCarthy by Hines, Briggs and Others, in Howard-street. Cunningham's Quarters at the City Prison. The Board of Aldermen. Police Intelligence. The Balance Dock Question.

docs.lead_paragraph: Yesterday the office of the Recorder was filled to overflowing with the principal fighting-men of the City, to hear the preliminary examination of CYRUS SHMAY, JOHN N. BRIGGS, SAMUEL E. BRIGGS and ANDREW HINES, on a charge, made through the affidavit of WILLIAM H.RACEY. of committing and aiding to commit a desperate assault on JOHN MACCARTHY--thy said parties having been, as it is alleged, hired to commit the assault by MARCUS CICERO STANLEY.

docs.snippet: Whenever an American citizen happens to get into a difficulty in the Chinese waters, on the Coast of Madagascar, or in the Sandwich Islands, our Government is always taunted with its cowardly and shameful indifference to the rights of Republicans;...

headline.main: A " Spirited British Minister " and the King of Naples.

docs.lead_paragraph: Whenever an American citizen happens to get into a difficulty in the Chinese waters, on the Coast of Madagascar, or in the Sandwich Islands, our Government is always taunted with its cowardly and shameful indifference to the rights of Republicans; and the throatening face of the British lion is usually held up in terrorem to frighten a timid President, and startle a lazy Cabinet into emulation of that noble and watchful beast.
